properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 10 at 2:19AM MST until January 12 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Great Falls MT
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow expected above 5000 feet. Total snow accumulations
of 3 to 6 inches at pass level, with up to 18 inches above pass
level.

* WHERE...Northern Rocky Mountain Front including Marias Pass and
St. Mary.

* WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 5 AM MST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Blowing snow could
significantly reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 5 AM MST SUNDAY ABOVE 5000 FEET
